bean.description: This bean provides LDAP facilities to all the other beans. It must implement interface org.esupportail.commons.services.ldap.LdapUserService. This service is used both for searching the attributes of connected users and also for searchin users (get their id from a part of their identity). In the example below, if "smith" is the search string, the search filter will be "cn=*SMITH*", and the corresponding users' ids will be found in attribute uid. This class caches the results of the LDAP requests and supports statistics retrieval.

property.name: ldapTemplate
property.description: The LDAP template used to access the LDAP directory.

bean.description: The LDAP template used to acces the LDAP directory. See http://ldaptemplate.sourceforge.net.

property.name: contextSource
property.description: The data source used by the LDAP template.

bean.description: This bean describes the physical acces to the LDAP directory. In the example below, anonymous and unsecured connections will be done to the LDAP directory running on server ldap.esup-portail.org on port 389, using the search base ou=people,dc=esup-portail,dc=edu, with scope "sub". See http://ldaptemplate.sourceforge.net.

property.name: url
property.description: The LDAP URL of the directory.

property.name: userName
property.description: The dn used to bind to the LDAP directory.

property.name: password
property.description: The password used to bind to the LDAP directory.

property.name: baseEnvironmentProperties
property.description: The environment properties, for instance to set the timeout.
